    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">EF Core 10 ç°å·²æ”¯æŒ LeftJoin å’Œ RightJoin è¿ç®—ç¬¦æŸ¥è¯¢äº†ï¼</span>

            <div class="postBody">

<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å‰è¨€</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æœ€è¿‘å‘ç° EF Core 10 ä¸­çš„æ–°å¢åŠŸèƒ½å¼•å…¥äº†åœ¨ LINQ ä¸­æ”¯æŒ LeftJoin å’Œ RightJoin è¿ç®—ç¬¦æŸ¥è¯¢çš„æ–°åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚åœ¨ EF Core 10 ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå¼€å‘äººå‘˜éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡å¤æ‚çš„ç»„åˆæŸ¥è¯¢å®ç° LEFT JOIN éœ€è¦åœ¨ç‰¹å®šé…ç½®ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œ<code><span>SelectMany</span></code><span>ã€<code><span>GroupJoin</span></code><span>&nbsp;å’Œ&nbsp;<code><span>DefaultIfEmpty</span></code><span>&nbsp;æ“ä½œã€‚</span></span></span></span></p>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æœ¬æ–‡å’±ä»¬ä¸€èµ·æ¥çœ‹çœ‹åœ¨ EF Core ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨ LeftJoin å’Œ RightJoin è¿ç®—ç¬¦è¿›è¡Œå·¦å³è¿æ¥æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ä»£ç ç®€æ´åº¦ã€‚</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>ç¯å¢ƒå‡†å¤‡</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>åœ¨æ­¤ä¹‹å‰æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å…ˆå®‰è£… .NET 10 å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒã€‚</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><a href="https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/10.0" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span>https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/10.0</span></a></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202504/1336199-20250428224306799-1275535775.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202504/1336199-20250428224313567-961913633.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>éœ€è¦å®‰è£…æœ€æ–°çš„ Visual Studio 2022 é¢„è§ˆç‰ˆæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨ Visual Studio Code å’Œ C# å¼€å‘å·¥å…·åŒ…æ‰©å±•æˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨ Rider æ¥é…åˆ .NET 10 ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>Visual Studio 2022 é¢„è§ˆç‰ˆï¼š<a href="https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/zh-hans/vs/preview" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://visualstudio.microsoft.com/zh-hans/vs/preview</a></li>
<li>C# å¼€å‘å·¥å…·åŒ…æ‰©å±•ï¼š<a href="https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-dotnettools.csdevkit" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-dotnettools.csdevkit</a></li>
</ul>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>EF CoreæŒ‡å®šä½¿ç”¨é¢„å‘è¡Œç‰ˆæœ¬</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202504/1336199-20250428224342559-343649296.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>æŒ‡å®šé¡¹ç›®ç›®æ ‡æ¡†æ¶</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202504/1336199-20250428224407621-1824394296.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>GroupJoin + SelectMany + DefaultIfEmpty å®ç°å·¦è¿æ¥</span></h2>
<blockquote>
<p><span>å®ç°åŸç†ï¼šGroupJoin + SelectMany + DefaultIfEmpty å®ç°å·¦è¿æ¥ã€‚è¯¥æ¨¡å¼åŒ…æ‹¬åœ¨å¤šä¸ªæ•°æ®æºä¹‹é—´åˆ›å»º GroupJoinï¼Œç„¶åé€šè¿‡å¯¹åˆ†ç»„æºä½¿ç”¨ SelectMany è¿ç®—ç¬¦ä¸ DefaultIfEmpty æ¥å¹³å±•åˆ†ç»„ï¼Œä»è€Œåœ¨å†…éƒ¨ä¸å…·æœ‰ç›¸å…³å…ƒç´ æ—¶åŒ¹é… nullã€‚</span></p>
</blockquote>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>GroupJoinï¼š å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªåºåˆ—æŒ‰å…³è”é”®è¿›è¡Œåˆ†ç»„è¿æ¥ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆåˆ†ç»„çš„åµŒå¥—ç»“æ„ã€‚</span></li>
<li><span>SelectManyï¼š å°†åµŒå¥—é›†åˆï¼ˆå¦‚é›†åˆçš„é›†åˆï¼‰å±•å¼€ä¸ºå•ä¸€åºåˆ—ã€‚</span></li>
<li><span>DefaultIfEmptyï¼š ä¼šç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª åŒ…å« null çš„é»˜è®¤æ¡ç›®ï¼Œç¡®ä¿å·¦è¡¨è®°å½•ä¸è¢«è¿‡æ»¤ã€‚</span></li>
</ul>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31dm1GicDGKZd4sKqW1aP3KQVWeqGFMn4HLsibhTopejvVRhIl1WPdPDg6Bp5h45xBjau56FG2rY9KW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var leftJoinQuery = from c&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;db.Classes<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; join t&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;db.Teachers on c.TeacherID equals t.TeacherID into teacherGroup<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; from t&nbsp;in<span>&nbsp;teacherGroup.DefaultIfEmpty()<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; select new<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; c,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; t<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; };<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var leftJoinQuery2 = db.Classes<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šGroupJoin åˆ›å»ºåˆ†ç»„å…³è”<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .GroupJoin(<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; db.Teachers,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; c =&gt; c.TeacherID,// å·¦è¡¨å…³è”é”®ï¼ˆClass çš„ TeacherIDï¼‰<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; t =&gt; t.TeacherID,// å³è¡¨å…³è”é”®ï¼ˆTeacher çš„ TeacherIDï¼‰<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; (c, teacherGroup) =&gt; new<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Class = c,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Teachers = teacherGroup<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; })<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; // ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šSelectMany å±•å¼€åˆ†ç»„å¹¶å¤„ç†ç©ºå€¼<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .SelectMany(<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; temp =&gt; temp.Teachers.DefaultIfEmpty(),// ç¡®ä¿å³ä½¿æ— å…³è”æ•™å¸ˆä¹Ÿä¿ç•™ Class ç­çº§ä¿¡æ¯<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; (temp, t) =&gt; new<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; temp.Class,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Teacher = t<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; });<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>LeftJoin è¿ç®—ç¬¦æŸ¥è¯¢</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31dm1GicDGKZd4sKqW1aP3KQVWeqGFMn4HLsibhTopejvVRhIl1WPdPDg6Bp5h45xBjau56FG2rY9KW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var newLeftJoinQuery = db.Classes<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;.LeftJoin(db.Teachers,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;c =&gt; c.TeacherID,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;t =&gt; t.TeacherID,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;(c, t) =&gt; new<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;{<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Class = c,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Teacher = t<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;});<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine("æ‰§è¡ŒSQL=&gt;&gt;&gt; "<span>&nbsp;+ newLeftJoinQuery.ToQueryString());<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>RightJoin è¿ç®—ç¬¦æŸ¥è¯¢</span></h2>
<pre data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31dm1GicDGKZd4sKqW1aP3KQVWeqGFMn4HLsibhTopejvVRhIl1WPdPDg6Bp5h45xBjau56FG2rY9KW/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-fail="0"><code><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; var newRightJoinQuery = db.Teachers<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; .RightJoin(db.Classes,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; t =&gt; t.TeacherID,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; c =&gt; c.TeacherID,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; (t, c) =&gt; new<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; {<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Teacher = t,<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Class = c<span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; });<span><br><span><br><span>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Console.WriteLine("æ‰§è¡ŒSQL=&gt;&gt;&gt; "<span>&nbsp;+ newRightJoinQuery.ToQueryString());<span><br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<h2 data-tool="mdniceç¼–è¾‘å™¨"><span>å‚è€ƒæ–‡ç« </span></h2>

</ul>
<h2><span class="content">C#/.NET/.NET Coreæ‹¾é—è¡¥æ¼</span></h2>
<p>æœ¬æ–‡å·²æ”¶å½•è‡³C#/.NET/.NET Coreæ‹¾é—è¡¥æ¼åˆé›†ä¸­ï¼Œæ›´å¤šC#/.NET/.NET Coreç›¸å…³çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹æ¬¢è¿æŸ¥é˜…ã€‚</p>
<ul>
<li>ğŸš€C#/.NET/.NET Coreæ‹¾é—è¡¥æ¼Giteeåˆé›†ï¼š<a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetStudy.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetStudy.md</a></li>
<li>ğŸ“šC#/.NET/.NET Coreæ‹¾é—è¡¥æ¼GitHubåˆé›†ï¼š<a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetStudy.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetStudy.md</a></li>
</ul>

</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <blockquote>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">ä½œè€…åç§°ï¼š</span><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank">è¿½é€æ—¶å…‰è€…</a></p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">ä½œè€…ç®€ä»‹ï¼š</span>ä¸€ä¸ªçƒ­çˆ±ç¼–ç¨‹ã€å–„äºåˆ†äº«ã€å–œæ¬¢å­¦ä¹ ã€æ¢ç´¢ã€å°è¯•æ–°äº‹ç‰©å’Œæ–°æŠ€æœ¯çš„å…¨æ ˆè½¯ä»¶å·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆã€‚</p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;">
æœ¬æ–‡ç‰ˆæƒå½’ä½œè€…å’Œåšå®¢å›­å…±æœ‰ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿è½¬è½½ï¼Œä½†æœªç»ä½œè€…åŒæ„å¿…é¡»ä¿ç•™æ­¤æ®µå£°æ˜ï¼Œä¸”åœ¨æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢æ˜æ˜¾ä½ç½®ç»™å‡ºåŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¿ç•™è¿½ç©¶æ³•å¾‹è´£ä»»çš„æƒåˆ©ã€‚å¦‚æœè¯¥ç¯‡æ–‡ç« å¯¹æ‚¨æœ‰å¸®åŠ©çš„è¯ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹ä¸€ä¸‹å³ä¸‹è§’çš„<a onclick="votePost(cb_entryId,'Digg')" href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red;">ã€â™¥æ¨èâ™¥ã€‘</a>ï¼Œå¸Œæœ›èƒ½å¤ŸæŒç»­çš„ä¸ºå¤§å®¶å¸¦æ¥å¥½çš„æŠ€æœ¯æ–‡ç« ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨æè¿°ä¸æ­£ç¡®çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿æŒ‡æ­£æˆ–è¡¥å……ï¼Œä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ã€‚
</p>
